statements: SELECT * FROM user_registration;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_registration WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, registration_date FROM user_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT email FROM user_registration WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM user_registration WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM user_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_registration WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM user_registration WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_registration WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM registration_date) AS month FROM user_registration GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM registration_date) ORDER BY total_users DESC, month ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payee_id, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, payment_date FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.payer_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT u.username AS payer, p.amount AS payment_amount FROM payments p JOIN users u ON p.payer_id = u.user_id WHERE p.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE currency = 'USD' AND balance > 1000;
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM cards ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users WHERE username = 'alice' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT method_name, user_id FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'Credit%';
